pSerializer Class Reference
[Serialization]

Class to import and export NxStream files. Those files can be created by 3D related content editors such as Maya and 3D-SMax. Also, you can dump the entire Virtools scene and load it in the supplied PhysX Viewer. More...

List of all members.

Detailed Description

Class to import and export NxStream files. Those files can be created by 3D related content editors such as Maya and 3D-SMax. Also, you can dump the entire Virtools scene and load it in the supplied PhysX Viewer.
